description.p: You understand magic items like you understand that one stubborn mule:

ul.li: You can "knack" a magic item, attuning to it and gaining proficiency in its use even if you normally could not.
You can only have one knacked item at a time, but can change your knack when you attune to a different item.

sheet.description: You are able to use a magical item and gain proficiency in its use. However only one item can be learnt at a time
